spiritsExplanation:
The workout video 'The Full Pyramid | 30 Minute HIIT Indoor Cycling Workout' strongly embodies the 'High-Energy & Intense' spirit, with a score of 0.9. This is supported by the use of terms such as 'HIIT' (High-Intensity Interval Training) and the pyramid structure of increasing and decreasing intensity intervals described in both the title and description. The emphasis on 'fat burning', 'interval training', and a call to 'get your water and towel ready' further indicates high exertion levels. The inclusion of music licensed by Epidemic Sound suggests an energizing atmosphere.

The 'Structured & Disciplined' spirit is also present, with a score of 0.7. The methodical 'pyramid set of one-minute intervals increasing from 1/10 to 10/10 then back down to 1/10' showcases a clear, progressive structure typical of disciplined, technical training. 

The mention of using a bike indoors places more focus on these two spirits, excluding others such as 'Outdoor & Adventure'. The metadata lacks elements of flow typically associated with 'Flow & Rhythm', and no indicators suggest a 'Soothing & Restorative' or 'Sport & Agility' session, given the indoor, cycling-specific context.
